AVSEC CIRCULAR NO. 13/2010 
 
Subject : PERMISSION FOR ACCESS OF VEHICLE UP TO TARMAC IN    
               RESPECT  OF  SMT. VIMLA SHARMA, WIFE OF LATE                       
               DR.SHANKAR DAYAL SHARMA, FORMER PRESIDENT OF INDIA.  
 
 
In continuation to BCAS Circular No.36/2005 dated 30.08.2005,       
Smt. Vimla Sharma, Wife of Late Dr. Shankar Dayal Sharma, former President 
of India is permitted to avail the facility of Airport Operators’ ferry vehicle to and 
from aircraft during arrival and departure at all civil airports in the country.  
 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security(CA). 
 
 
 
 
 
 
( M. Malaviya, IPS ) 
Addl.Commissioner of Security (CA)
